data.title: Beneath the Surface
data.meta_description:

Collaborating for the first time in horror fiction history, two brilliant award-winning and bestselling authors will come together to bring you a truly terrifying tale, complete with cover art by the legendary Steve Crisp.

S
data.text:
Cover art by Steve Crisp

Collaborating for the first time in horror fiction history, two brilliant award-winning and bestselling authors will come together to bring you a truly terrifying tale, complete with cover art by the legendary Steve Crisp.

Simon Clark, author of Vampyrrhic, and The Night of the Triffids, and Paul Kane, author of Blood RED, Sherlock Holmes and the Servants of Hell are working together for the first time to bring you Beneath the Surface.

Limited Edition Specifications

Limited to 250 signed, by authors Simon Clark and Paul Kane and artist Steve Crisp, numbered copies on a unique signature page dedicated specifically for this highly limited edition

Visually stunning cover art by Steve Crisp

Including an exclusive, never-before-seen interview with Simon Clark and Paul Kane

Four-colour laminated dust jacket

Printed on acid-free paper

Lettered Edition Specifications

Limited to 52 signed, by authors Simon Clark and Paul Kane and artist Steve Crisp, and lettered copies on a unique signature page dedicated specifically for this highly limited edition

Original and unique remarque by artist Glenn Chadbourne

Visually stunning cover art by Steve Crisp

Including an exclusive, never-before-seen interview with Simon Clark and Paul Kane

Four-colour laminated dust jacket

Printed on acid-free paper

Sign up to our newsletter to be the first to know when we have new books and sales:
